ExampleDefinition.Title: Dashed Line Styling
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates StrokeThickness, StrokeDashArray and PointMarker properties of a LineSeries which can be used to style a dashed or solid line with triangle markers
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Line Series Styling</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates StrokeThickness, StrokeDashArray and PointMarker properties of a LineSeries which can be used to style a dashed or solid line with triangle markers.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Almost any element in SciChart is stylable in Xaml and most parts of the chart are templated. You can easily set background, grid-line, axis label, viewport background and chart series colors in Xaml.</Run>
